html.p: The Splunk Add-on for PowerShell requires the .NET Framework 4.5 and PowerShell 3.0 to be installed on the host executing the modular input. This means that only Windows Server 2008 or newer (including Windows 7 and Windows 8) are supported. The following download locations can be used to download the .NET Framework 4.5 and the Windows Management Framework that contains PowerShell 3.0.
Once installed, you may be required to reboot the system. Note that Windows Server 2012 and later are already configured with these requirements.
